```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Used libraries
```{r libraries}
```

## Set seed to make experiment results recurrent
```{r set seed}
set.seed(5)
```

## Read data from file
```{r read data}
filename <- "sledzie.csv"
df <- read.csv(filename, na.strings=c("?"), nrows = 100)
print("Is data.frame instance?")
print(is.data.frame(df))
```

## Parse data
```{r parse data}
full_rows <- complete.cases(df)
df <- df[full_rows,]
print(df)
```

## Data set summary
```{r summary}
print("Size of cleared data:")
print(nrow(df))
print(sapply(df, mean))
```

## Show attribute distributions
```{r attributes distribution}
for(name in names(df)){
  d <- density(df[, name])
  plot(d, main="Density")
}
```
